# QIM Product SDK Docs

This site documents the Yocto layer meta-qcom-qim-product-sdk.

Key pages:
- /quickstart
- /build-image
- /artifacts
- /sdks
- /repo-structure

Use cases:
- How to sync a Qualcomm Linux Yocto BSP and add the QIM Product SDK layer
- How to build qcom-multimedia-image
- How to generate qcom-qim-product-sdk artifacts and Yocto SDK installers
